Let Us Have a Clean Sweep all around New York. The Next Task for Hercules Coleman. [Industrial pollution in New York City]
Let Us Have a Clean Sweep all around New York. The Next Task for Hercules Coleman. [Industrial pollution in New York City]
Reproduction of pen drawing by Thomas Nast in Harper's Weekly, August 20, 1881. Acquisition(?) date on front: March 30, 1944.
